statements: SELECT * FROM electronic_waste WHERE item_category = 'e-waste';
SELECT item_name, item_category FROM electronic_waste WHERE collection_type = 'hazardous' ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, collection_date FROM electronic_waste WHERE collection_point_id = 12345;
SELECT item_name, collection_type FROM electronic_waste WHERE collection_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM electronic_waste WHERE collection_type = 'recyclable' ORDER BY item_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM electronic_waste WHERE item_category = 'recyclable';
SELECT item_name, item_category, collection_type FROM electronic_waste WHERE collection_type = 'e-waste' ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, collection_date FROM electronic_waste WHERE collection_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, collection_type FROM electronic_waste WHERE item_category = 'hazardous' AND collection_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM electronic_waste WHERE collection_point_id = 12345 AND collection_type <> 'hazardous';
SELECT * FROM electronic_waste
SELECT item_name, category, weight_kg FROM electronic_waste ORDER BY weight_kg DESC
SELECT item_name, category FROM electronic_waste WHERE weight_kg > 5
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS total_items FROM electronic_waste GROUP BY category
SELECT item_name, collection_date FROM electronic_waste WHERE category = 'Electronics'
SELECT item_name, category FROM electronic_waste WHERE weight_kg > 5 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT id, item_name, weight_kg FROM electronic_waste WHERE category = 'Metal' ORDER BY weight_kg DESC;
SELECT * FROM recycling_program WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2021-06-30';
SELECT item_name, weight_kg FROM electronic_waste WHERE weight_kg BETWEEN 2 AND 7 ORDER BY weight_kg ASC;
SELECT program_name, location FROM recycling_program WHERE location IS NOT NULL ORDER BY program_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM electronic_waste ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, type, weight FROM electronic_waste WHERE type='smartphone';
SELECT program_name, location, start_date FROM recycling_programs ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT waste_type, average_weight FROM waste_analysis WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, type, location, timestamp FROM electronic_waste WHERE location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT type, weight, location FROM electronic_waste;
SELECT location, weight, timestamp FROM electronic_waste ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT program_name, location, start_date, end_date FROM recycling_programs WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT waste_type, average_weight, analysis_date FROM waste_analysis WHERE average_weight > 10;
SELECT id, waste_type, analysis_date FROM waste_analysis WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM electronic_waste_types;
SELECT type_name, description FROM electronic_waste_types WHERE recycle_code = 1;
SELECT center_name, location, contact_person FROM collection_centers ORDER BY center_name DESC;
SELECT event_date, total_collected_weight FROM waste_collection_events WHERE center_id = 3;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM recycling_programs WHERE program_type = 'Recycling';
SELECT * FROM electronic_waste_types WHERE recycle_code = 5;
SELECT type_name, description FROM electronic_waste_types WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT center_name, location, contact_person, contact_number FROM collection_centers ORDER BY center_name DESC;
SELECT event_date, total_collected_weight FROM waste_collection_events WHERE total_collected_weight > 100 ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT program_name, program_type, start_date, end_date FROM recycling_programs WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM electronic_waste;
SELECT waste_type, weight FROM electronic_waste WHERE weight > 100;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM waste_recycling_facilities ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT point_name, collection_capacity FROM waste_collection_points WHERE collection_capacity < 500;
SELECT facility_name, collected_weight, report_date FROM recycling_report WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM electronic_waste ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT waste_type, weight, collection_date FROM electronic_waste WHERE weight > 100 ORDER BY weight DESC;

SELECT f.facility_name, w.point_name, l.weight_collected FROM waste_recycling_facilities f JOIN waste_collection_points w ON f.facility_id = w.point_id JOIN collected_waste_log l ON w.point_id = l.collection_point_id;
SELECT r.report_id, f.facility_name, r.collected_weight, r.report_date FROM recycling_report r JOIN waste_recycling_facilities f ON r.facility_id = f.facility_id WHERE r.collected_weight > 500;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_facilities, SUM(capacity) AS total_capacity FROM waste_recycling_facilities;
